reaper.Description: Fainting foes in trainer battles heal you for 20%.

windrider.Name: Wind Rider
windrider.Description: No damage from wind, ups Atk/SpAtk instead.
windrider.FullDesc: Takes no damage from wind moves, but increases Attack and Special Attack instead.

teleface.Name: TV Face
teleface.Description: Prevent a physical attack. Can be restored in electric terrain.
teleface.FullDesc: Negates damage when hit with a physical attack, while in electric terrain it will recover its protection.

darkswarm.Name: Dark Swarm
darkswarm.Description: Forms a dark swarm while it has a lot of HP.

symphony.Name: Symphony
symphony.Description: Forms a symphony while it has a lot of HP.

destructivecore.Name: Destructive Core
destructivecore.Description: It explodes if its HP becomes half or less.

windfury.Name: Wind Fury
windfury.Description: Boosts wind moves 30%/ Reduces Wind dmg 50%.
